course_description: This course covers the basic concepts and elements of game theory with the emphasis on applying its various analytical tools and solution concepts to a variety of situations.The topics covered are static and dynamic games with complete information; static and dynamic games with incomplete information; and the refinements of equilibrium concepts.
sections: Class Nbr: 2429, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 8:30-9:45a, Instructor: I. Cho, Status: Open
